column4: Hi all,I'm new to ubuntu and was looking for some help could someone assist
if you have a more specific question - then just ask the question.
save it to a file, then  upload the file somewhere.. I imagine very few people have used djmix in here.
initial user has sudo/root rights and is the admin.. clafiry what you mean
wasent play dj an iphone app?
and play dj is a linux app from the repos? or where exactly?
what packages are you refering to?
just try it from the command line? sudp apt-get install flashplugin-installer
theres 1000's of torrent sites out there..  depends on what you want
its all about setting up sane 'properties'
time to learn some bash or perl or python, or other laungages then
I was learning bash to I had a problem when I used the ctrl x nothing happen got any ideas so I can get back to it ?
torrent clients dont HAVE to download every file in a torrent.. you can select what ones to download from a torrent
learn to use your torrent client..  unselext the ones you dont want.. select the ones you do want.. its not Rocket Surgery....
